system.description: You have learned to exploit weaknesses in cover, using your skill to rapidly degrade and destroy the protection your enemies rely upon.
system.benefit:
When the character damages cover, they add their degrees of success from the attack to the reduction of the cover's Armour Value. If using a weapon that doesn't require a skill test, add 1 instead.

If making multiple attacks, calculate each one at a time as earlier attacks will degrade or destroy cover for later attacks.

specialAbilities.name: Cover Destruction
specialAbilities.description: When damaging cover, add your Degrees of Success to the reduction of cover's Armour Value (+1 if weapon doesn't require a test).
